flexibleContent.heading: Techtic has helped diverse eCommerce businesses with second-to-none WooCommerce development services that enable them to sell more and achieve the highest milestones.

contentLists.heading: WooCommerce User Experience Consultation
contentLists.content: Get all your queries answered during the consultation with our experienced WooCommerce experts, and hire WooCommerce developers with the right expertise.

contentLists.heading: Woocommerce Store Development
contentLists.content: Build a highly responsive and functional digital store with a user-friendly look and feel and target potential customers across devices.

contentLists.heading: Woocommerce Customization
contentLists.content: With our WooCommerce website customization service, get the desired look and feel for your online store that drives conversions.

contentLists.heading: Woocommerce Custom Theme Development
contentLists.content: We design custom themes that maximize the visual appeal of your store, following the latest market trends to keep your store competitive.

contentLists.heading: Woocommerce Plugin Development
contentLists.content: Custom WooCommerce plugins are the key to giving your online store all the functionality it needs to offer a great customer experience.

contentLists.heading: Woocommerce Store Design
contentLists.content: We specialize in designing engaging and appealing WooCommerce stores and themes for eCommerce portals as per your requirements.

contentLists.heading: Magento to Woocommerce Migration
contentLists.content: We ensure seamless and secure migration from Magento to the WooCommerce platform with no threat to the existing database.

contentLists.heading: Maintenance, Support, and Upgrade Services
contentLists.content: We make sure that your eCommerce store is up and running with no downtime by resolving bugs and other performance issues in real-time.

contentLists.heading: How much does it cost to develop a WooCommerce Store?
contentLists.content: The development cost of WooCommerce Store is totally depends upon on the requirements of the project. To know the exact details of the cost to develop a WooCommerce Store, get in touch with us to get estimated budget-friendly pricing or you can email us at info@techtic.com.

contentLists.heading: How much time will it take to develop a WooCommerce Store?
contentLists.content: To be honest, it depends. It depends upon the size of your WooCommerce store and factors like features and functionalities you want to have in your WooCommerce Website development project. To precisely understand in-detail please, you can email us your WooCommerce Website requirement at info@techtic.com or directly get in touch with us today.

contentLists.heading: Why should I choose WooCommerce for my eCommerce store Development?
contentLists.content:
We can choose WooCommerce for eCommerce store development because:

  • It is Free
  • It is simple to use
  • It is customizable
  • It has more features and Integration Options
  • Wide range of Availability of Extension
  • Powerful Analytics
  • User and Customer Friendly
  • Compatible with WordPress
  • Great Customer Support and Large Developer Community

contentLists.heading: Why should I choose Techtic for WooCommerce Development Service?
contentLists.content:
You can choose Techtic for WooCommerce Development Service because:

  • Highly experienced WooCommerce developers
  • 24*7 Robust supports team
  • Deliver project on time and in budget
  • Agile Development Process
  • Transparent communication and development process
  • Good testimonials and client reviews
  • Excellent coding standards
  • Customer-centric Approach
  • Result-oriented strategies

contentLists.heading: Do you provide me support after the WooCommerce store is developed?
contentLists.content: Yes, at Techtic Solutions, our WooCommerce developers are always eager to provide support and help for your requirements of new features, maintenance and regular updates.

contentLists.heading: Can I migrate my existing website/store to WooCommerce platform?
contentLists.content: Yes. We can help you to migrate your existing website or eCommerce store to WooCommerce platform. Our skilled WooCommerce developers will ensure that your data is migrated from existing store to your new WooCommerce store smoothly.

contentLists.heading: Is there any hidden cost?
contentLists.content: TechTic Solutions believe in transparency. So, whatever price we discussed in our quote is final price. So, we are not believed in any hidden cost.

contentLists.heading: Do I own the ownership and the code of my WooCommerce Store Project?
contentLists.content: Yes, we will give you code ownership after the development of WooCommerce Store project. However, in some cases, depends on the NDA terms, then we claim ownership.

contentLists.heading: Does your developed WooCommerce Store Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly?
contentLists.content:
Yes, our WooCommerce developers build Mobile Friendly & Search Engine Friendly WooCommerce store.

We strictly follow responsive website guidelines and ensure that WooCommerce store works well on a wide variety of screen sizes, from tablets and smartphones to small & large desktop monitors.

We strictly follow all Google Webmaster and other Search engine guidelines while developing WooCommerce store.

contentLists.heading: Which methodologies and tools do you use to track my WooCommerce store development project?
contentLists.content:
We are using Agile project development methodology for meeting deadlines. Meanwhile, we also use cutting-edge project management tools to monitor and track every phase of WooCommerce store development. We build your WooCommerce store on our development server, so that you can monitor the progress of your WooCommerce store. Project Management Tools are:

  • Jira
  • Basecamp
  • Trello
  • Slack

contentLists.heading: What are the hiring models for WooCommerce Development Service?
contentLists.content: We offers fixed time/price model or fixed dedicated resource model for your WooCommerce store development service. You can choose hiring model as per your project requirement.
